Definition:Â  Special Provision Codes
Special provision codes
are used to identify those rating cases that contain an evaluation or combined degree that would
not
ordinarily be acceptable but for a special provision of the rating schedule or other Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) regulation.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
